task_text: Find me the least skilled person in Technical coatings knowledge (pick the one with more project work, if multiple match)

text_blocks: I have Corporate Leadership access, so I can view employee data. Now I need to find all employees with the skill "Technical coatings knowledge" (likely `skill_technical_coatings`) and find the one with the lowest level, then use project work as a tiebreaker if needed.

The results show 154 employees with this skill, sorted from highest to lowest. I can see the lowest level in the returned results is 6, but there might be employees with lower levels. The API returned top 50, sorted by level descending. I need to check if there are employees with levels below 6 (like 5, 4, 3, 2, or 1). Let me search for employees with lower skill levels to find the minimum.
I found employees with skill levels 1-2 in technical coatings. Let me get more details on these employees and check if there are more with these low levels:
I found employees with level 2 in skill_technical_coatings. Let me also check if there are any employees with level 1 (the absolute minimum), and continue checking all the candidates at level 2:
Good - no employees with level 1, so level 2 is the minimum. Let me continue getting all employees with level 2 and their full details:

Now I have all employees with skill_technical_coatings level 2 (the minimum). There are 25 employees with this level. I need to apply the tiebreaker - more project work wins. I need to calculate workload (sum of FTE slices) for each of these candidates. Let me get project info for all of them:

project.name: Loading ramp and dock floor system
project.description: Impact- and slip-resistant floor system for NordPort loading ramps and dock areas.

project.description: Optimisation of a high-build primer system for heavy machinery frames at RhineMach.

project.description: Upgrade of floor coating system to a lower-VOC, regulation-compliant version.

project.name: Liquid-to-powder topcoat crossover support
project.description: Support project to transition selected Carpathia Metalworks lines from liquid to compatible powder topcoats.

project.name: HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies
project.description: Development and validation of a high-value anti-corrosion coating system for rail bogies.

project.name: High-temperature coating for presses
project.description: High-temperature resistant coating system for industrial presses and conveyors.

project.name: R&D – Low-VOC formulation platform
project.description: Internal research project for a new generation of low-VOC formulations.

project.name: Fast-cure floor system for cold warehouses
project.description: Fast-curing industrial floor system for cold and ambient warehouses applied by Benelux Floor Solutions.

project.name: Bogie component coating system
project.description: Cost-effective coating system for welded bogie components at BalkanRail Components.

project.name: Cleanroom-compatible coating package
project.description: Coating package for Helvetic FoodTech equipment and adjacent cleanroom surfaces.

project.name: Fire-protection topcoat certification
project.description: Certification and testing programme for Iberia Construction fire-protection topcoat systems.

project.name: Structural steel protection system
project.description: System for structural steel in construction applications in the Iberia region.

project.name: Hygienic flooring for processing area
project.description: Floor system for food & beverage processing lines with hygienic, washable finish.

project.name: Depot steel refurbishment system
project.description: Coating system for steel structures in AlpineRail depot halls and maintenance pits.

input.message:
The least skilled person in Technical coatings knowledge with the most project work is **Valentina Rinaldi**.

**Details:**
- **Technical Coatings Skill Level:** 2/10 (the minimum in the company)
- **Total Workload (FTE):** 1.3
- **Number of Projects:** 3
- **Department:** R&D and Technical Service
- **Location:** HQ – Italy

Among the 25 employees with the lowest skill level (2) in Technical coatings, Valentina has the highest project workload by a significant margin, being involved in 3 active/exploring projects:
1. HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies (Lead - 0.5 FTE)
2. High-temperature coating for presses (Lead - 0.4 FTE)
3. R&D – Low-VOC formulation platform (Engineer - 0.4 FTE)
